name: Extreme Driving School Racing Test
description:
Become a driving school student, level your skills up to perfection and have fun playing Extreme Driving School Racing Test! Complete every difficult mission and learn various driving tricks and stunts! Master your skills and become the best driver ever!
Start the engine of your vehicle, fasten your seat belt, put your hands on the steering wheel and go! Control your auto really accurate and careful to follow all the traffic rules, because they’re really strict! Train hard and you’ll achieve a great success in this interesting driving course! Fit into every difficult turn, follow road markings, stop accurately and become the best driver ever!
Don’t forget to mind that every mistake will cost you some points! Practice your skills to earn points for successfully completed missions and buy new car or upgrade such characteristics as brakes, speed and mobility of your current vehicle! Color it up with new shades or buy new powerful auto to finish your training well! Try our Extreme Driving School Racing Test and have fun!
Check two game modes - exam mode, where you should go through several driving tests and carry out all learned tricks in a limited time; and training mode, where you will learn how to drive a car really accurately!
Extreme Driving School Racing Test features:
• Realistic driving school simulator
• Different interesting and difficult missions
• Wide range of powerful cars
• Check two game modes – training and exam mode
Wanted to learn how to drive a car, but have no time to attend special courses? Now you have a chance to practice your skills right at your home with our new Extreme Driving School Racing Test!
